meanings.definition: Covered with a layer of tarnish or oxidation.
meanings.sent1: The old statue had a patinated surface that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had a patinated frame that added character to the piece.
meanings.sent3: The patinated doorknob looked like it had been on a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box held memories, each patinated piece telling a story of its own.
meanings.sent5: The patinated coins in the jar gleamed with a history of use and wear.

meanings.sent1: The patinated vase on the shelf was a family heirloom.
meanings.sent2: The patinated copper roof of the barn had turned a beautiful green color.
meanings.sent3: The patinated car in the garage looked like it had seen better days.
meanings.sent4: Her patinated watch was a reminder of the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The patinated book cover hinted at the stories within its pages.
